source:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Ogul is tapping her foot impatiently.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
微風の浜のオグルは、イェドリマンへ戻るつもりのようだ。

source:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_01<tab>After checking the contents of her coinpurse, Ogul says that she would feel more comfortable with another job under her belt. She bids you return with her to Yedlihmad, and see what other work Kancana has on offer.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

オグルと話した。サベネア島のイェドリマンにいる「カーンチャナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_02<tab>Ogul enters Kancana's offices, complaining that her coinpurse has been stolen. Sympathizing with the young Au Ra's plight, Kancana offers to put her up for the night, as well as prepare a meal for the both of you. Meet with Kancana at her residence in Yedlihmad.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_02<tab>カーンチャナと話した。イェドリマンの「カーンチャナ」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_03<tab>You arrive at Kancana's domicile only to discover that her home has been ransacked. According to Kancana, the criminal was leaving the scene just as they arrived, and Ogul dashed off in pursuit without a second thought. The concerned Arkasodara would have you chase after Ogul, and see that she comes to no harm.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_03<tab>カーンチャナと話した。彼女の家が空き巣に遭い、オグルが犯人を追っているようだ。イェドリマンで「オグル」を探そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_04<tab>You find Ogul standing in the street, cursing after having lost sight of her prey. Convinced that the culprit was the same boy who took her coinpurse, she asks that you aid her in gathering information from the locals that might help lead to the thief's apprehension.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_04<tab>オグルを見つけた。犯人の手がかりを探すために、イェドリマンで住民に聞き込みをしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_05<tab>The locals you speak with seem to agree that the recent spate of thievery is all the work of the same young boy. Return to Kancana's offices and share your discovery with Ogul.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_05<tab>住民に聞き込みをした。イェドリマンの「オグル」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_06<tab>You report your findings to Ogul, and she responds with her own unsettling tale. It seems that the boy thief may have been employed by a grown man─a stranger who the local children say was offering easy coin in exchange for unspecified “work.” You will need to track down this shady character if you are to hold to account the true culprit behind these crimes.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_SEQ_06<tab>オグルに報告した。窃盗犯の子どもの背後に、主犯の大人がいるらしい。問題を解決するには、主犯を見つけるほかなさそうだ。
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_TODO_00<tab>イェドリマンのカーンチャナと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_000<tab>...Ready, then? I've been counting the contents of my coinpurse.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_000<tab>準備できたみたいだな！
こっちも、財布の中身を確認し終えたところだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_001<tab>I have enough to buy passage on a ship, but as for food and other supplies... Well, I would feel more comfortable with the pay from one more job weighing down my belt. You can see me through just one more, yes?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_001<tab>船賃はどうにかなりそうだけど……
食費その他を考えると、あとひと仕事かなぁ。
よかったら、もう少しだけ付き合ってくれると助かる！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_002<tab>At the very least, let us make our report to Kancana and ask what else she has on offer. Come! Show me how fleet of foot you are, champion!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_002<tab>イェドリマンに戻ったら報告も兼ねて、
ほかに依頼がないか、「カーンチャナ」に聞いてみよう。
どっちが早いか……競争だーっ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─safely back from your work on the shore, I see. ...But where is Ogul?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、おかえりなさい。
ひと仕事終えたようだけれど……オグルは一緒じゃないの？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_007<tab>Some slippery son of a dzo snatched it from me, brazen as you please! I lost sight of him in the market, along with all my worldly wealth! How am I to pay for lodgings!? Or food!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_007<tab>お財布ごと、まるっとスられたぁ～！
スリの犯人も見失って、完全に無一文のすかんぴん！
うわああっ、今日の宿場代も飯代もないぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_009<tab>Oh, you poor thing! And after all the good work you've done for us... You will stay with me tonight─I insist!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_009<tab>あらあら、それは可哀相に……。
私の家でよかったら、お泊まりなさいな。
仕事もしっかり、終えてくれたみたいだしねえ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_010<tab>Hm hm, I saw that! You looked me right in the eye! Finally warming up to us Arkasodara, are you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_010<tab>ふふ、ようやく目線を合わせてくれた！
少しは、アルカソーダラ族にも慣れてきた？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_011<tab>I...I can barely see you through the tears! But, yes, maybe now I can stand to be in the same room as a Matanga. Some of them, anyway.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_011<tab>涙でぼやけてるからだよぉ！
依頼のおかげで、多少はマタンガ族と、
同じ空気を吸うことに慣れてきたけど……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_012<tab>I'm glad to hear it. Here, and I'll lend you a few coins as well. We can't have you running around without a gil to your name.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_012<tab>よかったじゃないの。
ほら、無一文は不便だろうから、少しお金を貸しておくわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_014<tab>In fact, why don't we head to my house now, and we can fill that complaining belly of yours. You're more than welcome to join us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_014<tab>それと、うちでご飯を食べていきなさいな。
よかったら、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>もどうぞ。

TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_020<tab>ああ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……！
大変なことになったわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_021<tab>I've been robbed! We saw a boy jumping out of the window as we approached, and when I looked inside, all my belongings had been turned inside out.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_021<tab>私の家、空き巣に入られたみたいなの。
帰ってきたら、窓から飛び出す男の子が見えて……
室内を確認したら荒らされていたのよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_022<tab>Ogul set off in pursuit of the thief, but hasn't returned... Do you think you could catch up with her and see if everything's alright?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_022<tab>それで、「オグル」が犯人の子を追いかけていっちゃって……
心配だから、彼女を探してもらえる？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_100_022<tab>I'll lock up here, and you can meet me back at my offices when you've found her.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_100_022<tab>戸締まりは済ませたから、私も一回り探してみるわ。
彼女を見つけたら、いつもの場所にきてちょうだいね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_026<tab>I swear, it was that same Hyuran boy who made off with my coinpurse─his size, his clothing, it all matches.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_026<tab>犯人は、ヒューラン族の男の子だったんだけど、
私の財布を盗んだ子と、背格好が似てたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_027<tab>I was willing to cut my losses and earn more gil, but this insult to my host...it will not stand!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_027<tab>私が盗まれただけなら、稼ぎ直せばいいけど、
恩人のカーンチャナもってなると、無視はできないぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_028<tab>Grandmother always said to repay one's favors, and by the Dusk Mother, I mean to do just that. Will you help me find justice for Kancana?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_028<tab>ばあちゃんも「恩人には最大限報いるべし」って言ってたし！
頼むよ、犯人捜しを手伝ってくれ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_029<tab>Then we start by asking around for more information. I have a feeling we are not the only ones who have fallen afoul of this thieving urchin.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_029<tab>助かる！
まずは、犯人の手がかりを探さないとな。
ここの住人に、窃盗犯や被害のことを聞いてみるか。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_030<tab>The swifter we act, the better our chances, yes? I say we split up, gather what clues we can, then meet back at Kancana's offices!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_030<tab>今回は、速度重視で手分けしよう。
終わったら、カーンチャナのところで情報交換だ！
じゃ、あとでな！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_ABDHI_100_035<tab>The recent rash of pickpocketing? Oh yes, I've heard <var 1A 02 /var>several<var 1A 01 /var> stories. They say it's likely the work of the same criminal.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_ABDHI_100_035<tab>ああ、スリに遭ったって話は何件か聞いたぞ。
ここ最近、急に増えたから、犯人は同じヤツかもな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DJINAZADE_100_036<tab>This is secondhand information, mind you, but I hear that the thief you're looking for is barely more than a child.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DJINAZADE_100_036<tab>私は被害に遭ってないが、
子どもが盗みを働いてるって噂は聞いたことがある。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DJINAZADE_100_037<tab>Sad, isn't it? How terrible things have become that a young boy is forced into a life of crime just to survive...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DJINAZADE_100_037<tab>昨今の情勢も相まって、金に困ってるのかもな。
年端も行かない子どもが犯罪に手を染めちまうほどに、
追い込まれてるなんて……悲しいことだよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DARPASA_100_038<tab>There was another robbery? I wonder if it's the same boy I found in my house the other day.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DARPASA_100_038<tab>また窃盗事件があったの？
この前、私の家によその子が入り込んでいたのよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DARPASA_100_039<tab>He yelled that he was sorry, and when I saw the desperation on his face, I just...I didn't have the heart to chase after him.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DARPASA_100_039<tab>ごめんなさいと叫んで逃げたから、
無理には追いかけなかったけれど……。
困ったものね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_040<tab>I'm afraid that meal will have to wait...
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_040<tab>迷惑をかけちゃって、ごめんなさいねえ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_ABDHI_100_041<tab>I hope they catch the thief, and soon.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_ABDHI_100_041<tab>スリの犯人、はやく捕まるといいが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DJINAZADE_100_042<tab>Child thieves... The very thought of it breaks my heart.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DJINAZADE_100_042<tab>子どもが盗みとは、悲しいものだね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DARPASA_100_043<tab>Is there nothing that can be done for him, I wonder...?
target: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_DARPASA_100_043<tab>あの子にも、事情があるのだろうけど……。

TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_045<tab>おかえり！
そっちはどうだった？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_046<tab>...So, our tale was a familiar one. And what I heard from the local children was even more disturbing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_046<tab>ふんふん……
こっちは、子どもたちから気になる話を聞いたぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_047<tab>They tell me a man─a stranger─approached them with the promise of work and easy coin. I have no proof this offer is connected with the recent robberies...but it does seem suspicious.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_047<tab>最近、知らない大人から、
金になる仕事があるって声をかけられたんだと！
窃盗事件との関係性に確証はないけど、怪しいだろ？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_048<tab>And if this stranger truly is recruiting young ones to steal for him, then <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> is the one I would punish for these crimes. We just need to find him first...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_OGUL_000_048<tab>関係あるなら、子どもを捕まえるだけじゃダメだな。
償うべきは、裏にいるその大人だ。
居場所さえわかればなぁ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_049<tab>Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han closing its gates left many struggling to make a living. And the appearance of that ghastly tower sparked a chain of events that still has the Radiant Host spread too thin on too many fronts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_049<tab>近頃の不況で、経済的に苦しい人は多いわ。
その上、不気味な「塔」が現れたり、いろいろありすぎて、
星戦士団も手一杯……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_050<tab>Under the circumstances, a rise in crime is to be expected. We are fortunate, then, to have the two of you here to act on behalf of our lawkeepers. So please, accept this as payment─we cannot expect you to work on an empty stomach!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA203_04491_KANCANA_000_050<tab>治安に影響が出るのも当然ね。
ともかく、状況を探ってくれてありがとう。
ひとまずこれで、お腹を膨らませてちょうだいな。
